double_jeopardy.category: I'M LATE, I'M GREAT, I WAS SECRETARY OF STATE

clues.category: I'M LATE, I'M GREAT, I WAS SECRETARY OF STATE
clues.clue: Serving under Andrew Jackson, I gained the U.S. greater trading access; later I succeeded AJ as president

clues.category: I'M LATE, I'M GREAT, I WAS SECRETARY OF STATE
clues.clue: I was "the Great Pacificator" & in 1852 was the first man to lie in state in the Capitol rotunda, then went back to Kentucky

clues.category: I'M LATE, I'M GREAT, I WAS SECRETARY OF STATE
clues.clue: As an investor who didn't want to hear bad things about Theranos, I was played by Sam Waterston in "The Dropout"

clues.category: I'M LATE, I'M GREAT, I WAS SECRETARY OF STATE
clues.clue: I messed up saying I was "in control" in the White House, but earlier I really was as a shaky Richard Nixon's last Chief of Staff

clues.category: I'M LATE, I'M GREAT, I WAS SECRETARY OF STATE
clues.clue: My brother said "war is hell" & I quit as Secretary of State 4 days into the Spanish-American War, which I had opposed
